title: Font Creator 7.5 activation issue
content: I've been using my registered version for about half a month. It worked perfectly well, until today, it suddenly becomes UNREGISTERED. I tried to enter my registration code over and over and always got the message "Activation failed". Tried to re-install then re-activate and still failed. What's the matter?
author: aki3k

comments.content: Your question is best answered in the Font Creator forums or their Technical Support.
